analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HoldSaleContract.unlockTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#350-371):
	External calls:
	- OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[contributor].tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#358-369)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderList (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#367-368)

TokenSale.getTokensBack (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#541-547) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#545-547)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.sendTokensToHold (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#529-541):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getBalanceContract() >= tokenRaised) (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#533-534)
	- token.transfer(holdContract,tokenRaised) (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#534-541)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensTransferredToHold (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#536-537)

Reentrancy in HoldSaleContract.unlockTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#350-371):
	External calls:
	- OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[contributor].tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#358-369)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderWithdrawIndex (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#368-369)
	- tokenWithdrawHold (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#365-366)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x7ad96a52a5ff08609c0b85ddb64c28dee20e93af.sol#1): it allows old versions
